title: Price Reduced: 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Cy Young
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: Price Reduced: 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Cy Young
posts.post_content:
Wear to one side but rest of the supplement is in very good condition.  This is one of the earliest Cy Young pieces you will find.


Asking 9,750 OBO; would also consider trades —message me with any questions!
Ok Chris, I will take it at $9750.  PMing you now
